creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: window with scalloped top archway and view of rock and branches; wooden elements on white wall; blue and grey horizontal elements at top
inscription: Left: [一九六三年　窓と石庭] {1963nen saku, ?????}; bottom, in pencil: [Window + Stone Garden] [Toshi Yoshida]
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Window and Stone Garden
